title: #5: Blog to Book, Instagram's New Algorithm, Brand Name, and Content Production, #askhimandher Episode 5
description:
On this episode Lauryn and Michael discuss Taking a blog to a book and what it takes to become an author. They also run down the new Instagram algorithm, How to come up with a blog or brand name, and how to create a content production cycle.

To learn more about The Skinny Confidential visit the site HERE

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE
